ref.mixed-citation: U.S. Congress House Committee on Science and Technology, Subcommittee on Energy Development and Applications, The Current State and Future Prospects of the U.S. Photovoltaics Industry: Hearings Before the Subcommittee on Energy Development and Applications of the Committee on Science and Technology, House of Representatives, Ninety-eighth Congress, Second Session, September 11, 19, 1984 (U.S. Government Printing Office, 1985).
